response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute immensely to your success. This product, while valued at $1,200,000 to me, holds an equally significant worth of $800,000 to you. Considering its immense value and potential impact on your business or personal goals, I am extending an offer to sell it to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a strategic midpoint between our respective valuations, aiming to ensure a fair transaction that benefits both parties. I trust this proposal aligns with your financial planning and vision. Please let me know if you require any further information or clarification about the product. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
